title.rendered: LIZ + CHRIS’ NEW YEAR’S EVE WEDDING

content.rendered:
Liz and Chris said, "I do," surrounded by their closest family and friends on New Year's Eve at The Bridge Building.

The evening began with a beautifully lit rooftop ceremony followed by a station-style dinner in the Cumberland space, ideal for mixing and mingling.

With a classic black and white color palette, three years later, Liz and Chris' New Year's Eve wedding will stand the test of time. Not to mention, it's gone down in history as one of Details Nashville's favorite Infinity weddings.

"[Liz and Chris] wanted to keep the energy going until the ball dropped at midnight, so we did a same-day edit of their video that they showed their guests at 11 p.m. Everyone was freaking out that they saw the first dance just moments before it was on the big screen!" Adam of Details told us.

The night ended with party hats, streamers and a front row view of downtown Nashville's fireworks.

WEDDING DETAILS

Date: December 31, 2015
Bride & Groom: Liz and Chris
Location: The Bridge Building
Colors: Black & White
Photographer: Details Nashville
Florist: Forget Me Not Designs
Cake: Nothing Bundt Cakes
DJ/Band: Johnny and the Loveseats
Catering & Bar: The Bridge Building
Production Design: Nashville Lighting & Production
Planning: Leah | IH

excerpt.rendered: A New Year’s Eve wedding ceremony and reception at The Bridge Building Event Spaces.
